situation.title: Masks - outdoor
situation.meta_description: Obligation to cover your mouth and nose needs to be followed within any urban areas of cities, towns and villages.

content.processed:
Recommendations and Rules

It is mandatory to have the mouth and nose covered with a respirator or other protective device without an exhalation valve with a filtration efficiency of at least 94% (class FFP2 / KN 95) or a surgical mask in urban areas of towns, cities and villages. This means between buildings, shops, squares, and everywhere where people can be met.

Cloth mask, scarves or shawls are no longer considered sufficient protection.

Within the obligation of wearing a face mask in urban areas, there are some exemptions. The face covering does not need to be worn by children under the age of 3or by people who cannot wear a face covering because of a serious mental illness or intellectual impairment. 

You do not need to wear a mask or respirator only in the countryside outside of the city, as long as a safe distance of at least 2m away from other people can be kept,(persons living in the same household do not count).

Respirators provide more effective protection than masks. Therefore, we recommend that you wear them whenever you are away from home. By doing this, you will protect yourself and others.

links.title: Wearing a face mask is mandatory because it is stated in the Emergency Measures of the Ministry of Health. ou can also find here any exemptions of where the face covering does not need to be worn.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a face mask when I'm on a walk with my husband and while there is no one else around?
questions_answers.value: No, people who live in the same household are exempt.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a face mask while I'm waiting at a tram stop?
Do I need to wear a face mask while I'm running?
questions_answers.value: No, people who are exercising are exempt.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a face mask while I'm exercising in an outdoor playground?
questions_answers.value: No, people who are exercising are exempt.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a face mask while I'm being in a children playground?
questions_answers.value: Children under the age of 3 are exempt. Otherwise, the face mask is needed to be worn.
